thread.section_title: Hilton Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Would go again !
thread.title_full: Would go again ! - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Priya M
title: Would go again !
text: Excellent location! We just came back from NYC last week. Hotel is great!! Great room sizes excellent views! Staff and management are excellent!!! No noise for busy area. We asked for higher room and we given one at no extra charge as well as early checkin. Impressesd with hotel management they also honored a rate I had negotiated mths prior. Would go again!!!
